channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Ok, here's what i want to do. get a preety much built server e.g testscape, change the npc hp a bit. And make it so I can play it.
I tried to change it, compile it and then run it, but it kept coming up with tons of errors like cannot find the specified plave, javac is not regognised as a batch file/command.
Can somone tell me how to just get it running so I can use it on my comp.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

The compiler.bat will run your server so u dont have to use runserver.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

thanks but I have problems with the runserver.bat file as well it just says starting testscape and then doesn’t do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Right click your compile and click

Edit

Delete what is in there and replace in with

@echo off COLOR 08 title ElitePK Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

Where it says 1.5.0_06 Change that to the version of java you have

Read full topic
